Sentencas: The application of wet biomass in energy conversion systems is challenging, since in most conventional systems the biomass has to be dried.
Titulo: System Study on Hydrothermal Gasification Combined With a Hybrid Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Gas Turbine

Sentencas: Drying can be very energy intensive especially when the biomass has a moisture content above 50 wt.% on a wet basis.
Titulo: System Study on Hydrothermal Gasification Combined With a Hybrid Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Gas Turbine

Sentencas: The combination of hydrothermal biomass gasification and a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) gas turbine (GT) hybrid system could be an efficient way to convert very wet biomass into electricity.
Titulo: System Study on Hydrothermal Gasification Combined With a Hybrid Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Gas Turbine

Sentencas: Therefore, thermodynamic evaluation of combined systems with hydrothermal gasification units and SOFC-GT hybrid units has been performed.
Titulo: System Study on Hydrothermal Gasification Combined With a Hybrid Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Gas Turbine

Sentencas: Three hydrothermal gasification cases have been evaluated; one producing mainly methane, a second one producing a mixture of hydrogen and methane and the last one producing mainly hydrogen.
Titulo: System Study on Hydrothermal Gasification Combined With a Hybrid Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Gas Turbine

Sentencas: These three gasification systems have been coupled to the same SOFC-GT hybrid system.
Titulo: System Study on Hydrothermal Gasification Combined With a Hybrid Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Gas Turbine

Sentencas: All the integrated systems have electrical exergy efficiencies around 50%, therefore, the combination of supercritical water gasification and SOFC-GT hybrid systems seems promising.
Titulo: System Study on Hydrothermal Gasification Combined With a Hybrid Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Gas Turbine

Sentencas: The overall system performance depends for a large part on the liquid gas separation.
Titulo: System Study on Hydrothermal Gasification Combined With a Hybrid Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Gas Turbine

Sentencas: Further research is required for finding out the optimal separation conditions.
Titulo: System Study on Hydrothermal Gasification Combined With a Hybrid Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Gas Turbine
